name: Dynamic Boss Difficulty Prototype
description:
Hello there!

This project isn't meant to be a complete experience. It's just part of the research I'm doing for my bachelor project.

Please make sure to read the text file that comes with the game and take a minute afterwards to give feedback through the form linked at the end of the game.

If the jump/crouch don't work if you tick the boxes, please close the game and restart. For some reason it bugs out. This bug was fixed.

I hope you enjoy playing it.

Thanks. : )
